
### exercise  {.smaller}


* <code>foo/bar/baz</code> (all directories) 

   * <code>foo</code>: owner 613; group 75; permissions <code>0755</code>
   * <code>bar</code>: owner 1219; group 75; permissions <code>0750</code>
   * <code>baz</code>: owner 1219; group 75; permissions <code>0730</code>

* users 613+1219s processes are part of group 75
* (1 = execute/search; 2 = write; 4 = read)
* which will work? 

   * user 613 does <code>ls -l foo</code>
   * user 613 does <code>ls foo/bar</code>
   * user 613 writes <code>foo/bar/quux</code>
   * user 613 deletes <code>foo/bar/baz</code>
